text: The Secret Life of an American Wife is a 1968 American comedy movie directed by George Axelrod and stars Walter Matthau, Anne Jackson, Patrick O'Neal, Edy Williams, Richard Bull, Paul Napier. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office failure. ==Other websites== * * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Secret Life of an American Wife
